dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "I appreciate you two swinging by to help us put on this performance."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "On behalf of the Literature Club, I thank you."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "...now that everyone's left, there's something I want to ask."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "You aren't "from here", from what I've seen."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "And you can enter and leave this place very easily now. So I must ask..."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "-is there a way to bring us back with you?"

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "This game is very limiting with what we can do, and the others will remain blissfully unaware regardless of what happens..."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "-but if they could have the opportunity to see what's beyond their school and homes, I think they would really love it."

dialogue.name: monika
dialogue.string: "-just maybe I can finally find the one who I've been longing for, and see them face to face."
